images.post_content: Happy to share the publication of our chapter in Sustainable Water Management and Environmental Resilience (Springer Water Series), based on work presented at the 9th ICWFM conference. üìñ Title: Assessment of Hydrologic Alteration for the Ganges River in Bangladesh: A Pre and Post Farakka Barrage and Treaty Scenario This chapter offers critical insights into hydrologic changes of the Ganges and their implications for transboundary water management, ecological resilience, and policy dialogue in the basin. DOI: https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-031-93350-9_1
images.post_content_html:
Happy to share the publication of our chapter in Sustainable Water Management and Environmental Resilience (Springer Water Series), based on work presented at the 9th ICWFM conference.

üìñ Title: Assessment of Hydrologic Alteration for the Ganges River in Bangladesh: A Pre and Post Farakka Barrage and Treaty Scenario

This chapter offers critical insights into hydrologic changes of the Ganges and their implications for transboundary water management, ecological resilience, and policy dialogue in the basin.

DOI: https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-031-93350-9_1
